# DEPARTMENT OF STATE TELEGRAM
**UNCLASSIFIED**

1. DR. TAPIA OF SUGAR INSTITUTE CLARIFIED THAT LETTER TO HOUSE
COMMITTEE SENT ABOUT ONE WEEK AGO WAS SIGNED BY MININD/COM
AND WENT DIRECTLY TO BOLIVIAN EMBASSY WASHINGTON FOR FORWARDING TO
COMMITTEE AND WAS NOT SENT THROUGH MINFON. TAPIA SAID SECOND LETTER
TO COMMITTEE SIGNED BY MINFON SENT MARCH 4.


2. EMBASSY ALSO RECEIVED MINFON NOTE DATED MARCH 4 STATING THAT
BOLIVIA WILL MEET ITS 1974 QUOTA AND DESIRES TO INCREASE ITS
QUOTA OR TAKE ADVANTAGE OF ANY OPPORTUNITY TO EXPORT ADDITIONAL
AMOUNTS
OF SUGAR TO THE U.S. MARKET ON OTHER BASES. NOTE WILL BE SENT
UNDER AIRGRAM.
STEDMAN
